comments:
If the form text in the in the <intro> element of a composite cheat sheet is not well formed an exception is printed to the log and the cheat sheet does not open successfully.

See the attached composite cheat sheet for an example.

Here's the stack trace

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Argument not valid
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3333)

This problem was fixed by the changes to form text parsing that were in the fix for Bug 132210.
